# GitHub Repository Description

**Production-ready asynchronous task processing system with Go, RabbitMQ, Redis rate limiting, and JWT auth**

## Topics/Tags (untuk GitHub)
- go
- golang
- rabbitmq
- redis
- postgresql
- jwt
- docker
- microservices
- async
- task-queue
- distributed-systems
- rate-limiting
- ci-cd
- integration-tests
- production-ready

## Short Description (max 350 characters)
A scalable, distributed task orchestration platform built with Go. Features: JWT authentication, Redis rate limiting, RabbitMQ message queue, PostgreSQL storage, comprehensive testing (unit + integration), and complete CI/CD pipeline. Production-ready with Docker Compose deployment.
